Looping @Navtech International <mailto:navtech.uae@eim.ae> /@Navtech International <mailto:claims@navtechgroup.com>  for urgent assistance.

 

May we request for the following details: 

•                     Clarification on delayed reporting

•                     Incident Report: Brief description of the incident clarifying when and where the loss was first noticed. 

•                     Photographs (at the time of loading at the source and at the time of offloading at the final destination) 

•                     Damage Certificate from the carrier 

•                     Packing List 

•                     Truck waybill as applicable 

•                     Customs Receipt - at source 

•                     Proof of delivery (if not claused, reason for not clausing) 

•                     Immediate notice of loss against carriers (or the local agents of the carriers) 

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

Non Motor Claims Manager (Property & Casualty)

Dear Nathalie,

 

Thanks for the notification.

Please urgently advise the location and contact person for immediate survey. Looping @Navtech International <mailto:navtech.uae@eim.ae> /@Navtech International <mailto:claims@navtechgroup.com>  for urgent assistance.

 

May we request for the following details: 

•                     Clarification on delayed reporting

•                     Incident Report: Brief description of the incident clarifying when and where the loss was first noticed. 

•                     Photographs (at the time of loading at the source and at the time of offloading at the final destination) 

•                     Damage Certificate from the carrier 

•                     Packing List 

•                     Truck waybill as applicable 

•                     Customs Receipt - at source 

•                     Proof of delivery (if not claused, reason for not clausing) 

•                     Immediate notice of loss against carriers (or the local agents of the carriers) 

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

Dear Nino, 

 

I refer to subject survey carried out at M/s Real Emirates LLC, DIP on 15th April 2025.

 

Based on our inspection the observed damages were limited to the sole part of the shoes / scandals without any external exceptions on the cartons.

 

Please note that the observed damages on the sole part of the shoes in prima facia pre-quality / pre-shipment issues, kindly note that there is no transit peril involved at this juncture.

 

Therefore, kindly revert the claim towards the supplier for a fruitful recovery.

 

Missing items - 2 pcs 

 

Please note that policy requires short landing claims to be supported by short landing supported by the appropriate documentary evidence issued by the relevant airport/seaport authorities / customs department failing which such claims will not be admissible, therefore, kindly provide short landing certificate for our review.

Dear Nino, 

 

I refer to subject survey carried out at M/s Real Emirates LLC, DIP on 15th April 2025.

 

Based on our inspection the observed damages were limited to the sole part of the shoes / scandals without any external exceptions on the cartons.

 

Please note that the observed damages on the sole part of the shoes in prima facia pre-quality / pre-shipment issues, kindly note that there is no transit peril involved at this juncture.

 

Therefore, kindly revert the claim towards the supplier for a fruitful recovery.

 

Missing items - 2 pcs 

 

Please note that policy requires short landing claims to be supported by short landing supported by the appropriate documentary evidence issued by the relevant airport/seaport authorities / customs department failing which such claims will not be admissible, therefore, kindly provide short landing certificate for our review.

 

In the meantime, kindly provide us with the following details / documents 

 

1.	Pre-shipment photographs
2.	Irregularity report
3.	Short landing certificate 
4.	Delivery note with appropriate remark

 

Any additional documents will be requested in due course

Dear Nino, 

 

I refer to subject survey carried out at M/s Real Emirates LLC, DIP on 15th April 2025.

 

Based on our inspection the observed damages were limited to the sole part of the shoes / scandals without any external exceptions on the cartons.

 

Please note that the observed damages on the sole part of the shoes in prima facia pre-quality / pre-shipment issues, kindly note that there is no transit peril involved at this juncture.

 

Therefore, kindly revert the claim towards the supplier for a fruitful recovery.

 

Missing items - 2 pcs 

 

Please note that policy requires short landing claims to be supported by short landing supported by the appropriate documentary evidence issued by the relevant airport/seaport authorities / customs department failing which such claims will not be admissible, therefore, kindly provide short landing certificate for our review.

 

In the meantime, kindly provide us with the following details / documents 

 

1.	Pre-shipment photographs
2.	Irregularity report
3.	Short landing certificate 
4.	Delivery note with appropriate remark

 

Any additional documents will be requested in due course
